item.title: My first post
item.description: discord-csgo-bot ðŸ”—A simple discord bot for getting the status of a CSGO server via command Installing ðŸ”—python3 -m venv env source env/bin/activate pip3 install -r requirements.txt Configuration ðŸ”—You will need to create a file named config.json in the base directory. server_ip: server ip server_port: server port custom_thumb: custom thumbnail path for the server status embed, leave empty if you don’t want it token: your discord api token command_prefix: command prefix.
